attributes.action: Force the CSA to take into account Housing Costs of the NRP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the ever rising costs of housing, regardless of whether you are renting or have a mortgage, I feel these costs should be taken into account by the CSA when making an assessment of the NRP. The cost of accomodation and the ever increasing rise in Council Tax is putting financial strain on NRP's.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/csanrpwonly/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
